column3: Institute of Business, Industry and Leadership
column5: If you aspire to work in the global business world with multi-national companies, our course will help you to secure the professional knowledge and skills to bolster your career in this fast-paced market.You will learn about international business practices, operations, sustainability and strategic management in the context of today’s complex and changing globalised marketplace.COURSE OVERVIEWYou will learn in a ‘global classroom’ alongside international students, where you can experience a social and cultural understanding of practice in other countries, helping to inform your cross-cultural business reasoning, practices and solutions. Plus, it gives you the opportunity to secure contacts across the globe.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
